skills.name: Thrash
skills.description: Thrashes the enemy, inflicting damage proportionate to your MAX HP. The attack has a 50% chance to reduce the enemy's Attack Bar by 25%.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +20%
skills.multiplier_formula: 1.7*<mark>ATK</mark> + 0.15*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Roar
skills.description: Inflicts damage proportional to your MAX HP to all enemies and decreases their Attack Power for 2 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.2*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>

skills.name: Counterblow
skills.description: Provokes all enemies with a 70% chance, and counterattacks every time you receive damage for 3 turns.
skills.level_progress_description:
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE

skill_effect.name: Provoke
skill_effect.description: The monster is forced to only attack the monster which applied the effect
